posts.author: Darth Vader
posts.title: Let's become Jedi friends! (force sensitive users are allowed as well)
posts.description: Hello fellow Teddirs! I am new to this part of the galaxy so I am looking to meet other fellow Jedis. Please leave your full name, phone number, email, home address, universe security number, years of jedi experience, and a photo of yourself in the comments! I will follow up with you as soon as possible.

comments.text: Hello Darth Vader, I would love to be your friend!! My name is Luke Skywalker, 777-777-7777, lukeskywalker@jedi.com, 1111 1st street, Polis Massa, Tatooine

posts.author: Darth Vader
posts.title: Looking for people to join the Dark Side
posts.description: Come and join me at the Death Star to learn about the power of the dark side. There will be free snacks and drinks! Jedis are STRONGLY encouraged to come.

posts.author: Han Solo
posts.title: Willing to smuggle ANYTHING to ANYWHERE #BestSmugglerInTheGalaxy
posts.description: I can smuggle just about anything anywhere. People, drugs, weapons, if you have the credits I'll move it!
